attributes.action: Compensation for Nurses and CSWs injured in their execution of their duty
attributes.additional_details: May Nurses and Support Workers sustain injuries resulting from an assault in the execution of their duty and may need to have a period of time off work to receive treatments and recuperate.  Many only entitled to a few months of full pay, followed by half pay and then statutory sick pay leading to financial problems during a troubling time.
attributes.background: To back a compensation scheme where by Nurses and Support Workers who sustain an injury whilst at work from being assaulted by a patient

rejection.details: There are already NHS Injury Allowance provisions which top up sick pay for eligible staff for work-related injuries or illness. You can find out more about these provisions here: https://www.nhsemployers.org/articles/nhs-injury-allowance-guidance
